about.description: I'm Thành - a developer specializing in cross-platform IoT applications. With 3 years of experience, I can build complete IoT systems, from firmware programming for microcontrollers (Arduino, ESP, STM32 using C++) to developing user control applications (using Flutter) and backend data processing (with NodeJS, Firebase, MQTT).

arduino_app.title: Arduino Drag-and-Drop App
arduino_app.description: A React Native app for programming Arduino with a drag-and-drop interface and Bluetooth upload.
